title: METAL TOP 1000 PART 801-900
description:
METAL TOP 1000 PART 801-900

Part 9

On this part, no fucking great tracks still, though that list is very diverse and presents a huge panorama of metal. We can find here genres that are very rarely put on covers, such as doom with Esoteric, hardcore with Number Twelve or Into the Moat, postrock with PTW or old bands that are the roots of everything to come.
